Apr 14

16 Wins A Ring Staff Playoff Predictions

The 16 Wins A Ring team has come together to make our 2017 NBA Playoff Predictions. Check below for your favorite writers’ predictions and follow along with us as the playoffs commence!

Pete Toal

Eastern Conference

Boston over Chicago — 5 games

Cleveland over Indiana — 4 games

Toronto over Milwaukee — 4 games

Washington over Atlanta — 5 games

Eastern Conference Finals

Cleveland over Washington — 6 games

Western Conference

Golden State over Portland — 4 games

San Antonio over Memphis — 5 games

Houston over Oklahoma City — 6 games

LA Clippers over Utah — 7 games

Western Conference Finals

Golden State over Houston — 6 games

NBA Finals

Golden State over Cleveland — 6 games
